Skip tracks when screen is off After the phone goes to deep sleep without playing music, volume buttons cannot play - stop music. Use in that situation other keys (power, home) to play - stop Enable Skip Tracks Double click play/stop music
Options for Actions Configure common options for actions Hw and navbar keys mapping Volume keys skip tracks Back key mapping
Recents key mapping Home key mapping Power key mapping Bixby key mapping
When screen is off When in lock screen When in user screen
Back key map in user screen Back key map in lock screen
Recents key map in user screen Recents key map in lock screen
Power key map in user screen Power key map in lock screen Power key map when scree is off
Home key map in user screen Home key map in lock screen Home key map when screen off
Bixby key map in user screen Bixby key map in lock screen Bixby key map when scree is off
Enable Back Key mod Enable Recents Key mod Enable Home Key mod Enable Power Key mod Enable Bixby Key mod
Double tap max time After selecting your options on every category, press one of the existing buttons to update the mod in rom. You do not need to do it on boots, just when you change a value and you want it to take effect in rom Single Tap Action Double Tap Action Long Press Action Press to apply the mod in Rom App, Activity or shortcut in single tap App, Activity or shortcut in double tap App, Activity or shortcut in Long Press Single Tap Action Double Tap Action Long Press Action

Status Bar Mods Visibility of views Stock Views Visibility options Select views to hide This option is applied both in user and lock screens. It only applies to main views and system icons
Mods in Recents Screen Ram - Swap Info Enable Ram - Swap Info Ram - Swap Info Options Refresh time Background Color Main Text Color Color for used Ram-Swap Color for free Ram-Swap Text Size
Recents Background To remove bg image, just double tap on the preference and confirm Enable Custom Background Select Background Image Background Image Options Blur effect ratio Image Quality Image tint color Image Opacity
Mods in Lock Screen Lock Screen behaviour Allow fingerprint unlock after reboot Allow notification quick reply Enable or disable notifications quick reply in secure lock screens Enable finger print wake up Finger print wake up will not work when in deep sleep!! Enable quick smart unlock Go to home screen when the phone is unlocked by smart unlock Views colors

Display Battery Percentage Show network speed view Use simple status bar Show only recents notification icons Max number of icons
Nofifications Manager Led color, sound and vibration Per App Led Color Take into account that in s7/e the led is very limited allowing a very low amount of colors. Try to use the right side of the color selector and the vertical gradient selector. Led Configuration
Notification Led Quiet hours Disable led light for notifications in a given time range. To have it always enabled select same start and end time. Remember that double clicking on the preferences makes it to be reset From ... To.... Enable Led quiet hours
Nofification sounds quiet hours Enable nofification sounds quiet hours Select a time range in which notifications sounds (if enabled) will not sound Use also led quiet hours
Nofification vibration quiet hours Enable nofification vibration quiet hours Select a time range in which notifications vibrations (if enabled) will not occurre
Battery Led Colors Battery Led Mods
Colors when in Light Bgs Colors when in Dark Bgs

Enable Floating Ball View Floating ball view size Ball Color Use background image Vibrate on gestures FBV Single Tap Actions FBV Double Tap Actions FBV Swipe Up Actions FBV Swipe Down Actions FBV Swipe Left Actions FBV Swipe Right Actions
Applications Protection White List - Remove App White List - Clear Memory Select the apps to be protected when you run the clear memory action White List - Kill App Select apps to be protected when you run the kill app action Select apps to be protected when you run the remove app action Popup messages (toasts) Toast when app killed Toast when app removed Toast when all app killed Toast when all app killed Vibrations Vibrate with screen off actions
